order_desc_one: Did you know there are over 13 features on Pacific Place Offices app designed exclusively for the unique personalities that work here?
order_desc_two: Whether you are a creative visionary, a passionate socialiser, or a no-nonsense achiever – the app is customised to enhance every aspect of your workday.
introduction_desc_one: Presenting 3 unique experiences, you can customise your gift and express your personality with Pacific Place Offices. Showcasing wide variety of features the app offers and emphasising on catering to your unique needs, making your everyday moments that much better.
introduction_desc_two: Discover how Pacific Place Offices app helps cater to your everyday needs - there’s something for everyone so order up at our pop-up stores!
redemption_step_one: Select a gift from the following options and create your unique design.
redemption_step_two: Show your design at our pop-up store. Our staff will make your gift to order.
redemption_step_three: Get your customised gift on the spot and enjoy!
redemption_desc: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy text ever since the 1500s, when an unknown printer took a galley of type and scrambled it to make a type specimen book. It has survived not only five centuries, but also the leap into electronic typesetting, remaining essentially unchanged. It was popularised in the 1960s with the release of Letraset sheets containing Lorem Ipsum passages, and more recently with desktop publishing software like Aldus PageMaker including versions of Lorem Ipsum.
electronic_bag_desc: Visit the 'CLUTCH & GO' station at <underline>One Pacific Place</underline> to enhance your workday. Upgrade your everyday accessory by designing a unique electronics pouch featuring your initials along with characters or quotes that represent your personality.
wellness_bag_desc: Head to the 'GEAR UP & GO’ stall at <underline>Two Pacific Place</underline> for a wellness bag designed for your best trainers and workout gear, perfect for your active lifestyle. It not only complements your routine but also sparks conversations with new faces at community events.
workfolio_desc: Stop by the ‘PACK & GO’ station at <underline>Three Pacific Place</underline> to upgrade your work-life with the versatile work folio. This multi-functional organiser stores essentials such as laptop and stationery, streamlining your workday for enhanced productivity.
bag_desc: Presenting 3 unique experiences, you can customize your gift and express your personality with Pacific Place Offices.
